NAME

META_ELLIPSE

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 Ellipse
(
HDC32 hdc,
INT32 left,
INT32 top,
INT32 right,
INT32 bottom
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 array noValue
0bottom, bottom of bounding box
1right, right of bounding box
2top, top of bounding box
3left, left of bounding box
left, right, top and bottom are the extents of the ellipse.

back
